utterances.utterance: I do too. Jon, congratulations on your show. Everybody, watch. It's on Paramount. He's got his 200th episode. It's a fantastic show. Once you start watching, it's like potato chips. Thanks, Jon. Up next, Anthony Weiner is using his crotch to bump up his wallet.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: Wow.
